00050 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_AUTO_Exported_Constants SPI_FLASH_AUTO exported constants
00052   * @{
00053   */
00054 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_JEDECID           (0x9F)  /*!< Read JEDEC ID instruction                             */
00055 
00056 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_CE                (0x60)  /*!< Chip Erase instruction                                */
00057 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_SE                (0x20)  /*!< Sector Erase instruction                              */
00058 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_READ              (0x0B)  /*!< Read Data instruction                                 */
00059 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_DREAD             (0x3B)  /*!< Read Data instruction                                 */
00060 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_WRSR              (0x01)  /*!< Write Status Register instruction                     */
00061 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_WREN              (0x06)  /*!< Write enable instruction                              */
00062 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_WRDI              (0x04)  /*!< Write disable instruction                             */
00063 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_RDSR              (0x05)  /*!< Read Status Register instruction                      */
00064 
00065 #define MX25L1606E_CMD_WRITE             (0x02)  /*!< Program the selected page instruction                 */
00066 
00067 #define MX25L1606E_JEDEC_ID              (0xC22000)
00068 #define MX25L1606E_JEDEC_IDMASK          (0xFFFF00)
00069 
00070 #define MX25L1606E_PAGESIZE              (256)
00071 /**
00072   * @}
00073   */
00074

00077   * @{
00078   */

00080 void MX25L1606E_BufferWrite(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte);
